channel.title: Deloughry.co.uk
channel.description: Developer. Streamer. Tweeter. & a little bit of everything Nerdy!_

item.title: Integrating Webmentions with Next.JS
item.description: I recently read about Webmentions and suddenly was hit with a major case of nostalgia for the days of pingbacks and the days of seeing the long list of likes, shares and reposts on Tumblr (Yes! I was one of those angsty teenagers üòõ), and I had to implement!

item.title: Using MongoDB‚Äôs Data API, Next.js with SWR to make a page click tracker.
item.description: With a new website build, I wanted to gain some knowledge of what traffic was like on my website, more importantly, my ‚ÄúLogs‚Äù, as these are posts that are a mix of both short and long forms of posts I just wanted to see which of these posts were doing better or worse

item.title: Work in Progress
item.description: I am a big believer in striking while the iron is hot, and personal projects are no exception! So today I've deployed the new look website, but it is still very much a WIP.

item.title: It has to change! Shape up! Do Better!
